byline.contributor: Gary Gately reported from Baltimore, and Christine Hauser from New York. Eric Lichtblau contributed reporting from Baltimore, and Christopher Mele from New York.
byline.original: By GARY GATELY and CHRISTINE HAUSER

lead_paragraph: The children were among nine from the same family who were in the building when the fire began. The other three escaped with their mother and were hospitalized.
snippet: The children were among nine from the same family who were in the building when the fire began. The other three escaped with their mother and were hospitalized....

headline.main: Bodies of Six Children Recovered After Baltimore House Fire
headline.print_headline: 6 Children of Congressional Aide Die in Baltimore Fire
